mdRecord.dcterms:title: Oeuures francoises de Ioachim Du-Bellay, gentil homme Angeuin, & poëte excellent de ce temps
Oeuvres francoises de Joachim Du-Bellay
Du Bellay, Joachim, approximately 1522-1560. Works. 1569
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Aubert, Guillaume.
Chambolle-Duru (Firm)
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Du Bellay, Joachim, approximately 1522-1560
Morel, Fédéric, approximately 1552-1630
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reueuës, & de nouueau augmentees de plusieurs poësies non encores auparauant imprimees. /

Defense et illustration de la langue francoise -- L'olive, et autres oeuures poetiques -- Recueil de poesie presente a tresillustre princesse Madame Marguerite -- Deux liures de l'Eneide de Virgile -- Diuers poemes de I. Du Bellay -- Les regrets, et autres oeuures poetiques -- Diuers ieux rustiques -- Epithaleme sur le mariage de tres-illustre Prince Philabert Emanuel ... & tres-illustre Princesse Marguerite de France.
Signatures: a⁸b⁴ A-E⁸ A-K⁸ A-M⁸ A-L⁸ A-G⁸H⁴ A-H⁸ A-K⁸ A-I⁸.
Epistre au Roy signed, in print: G. Aubert.
Special title-pages (dated 1569 or 1568), and separate pagination and signatures for each of the titles listed in contents.
Includes French and Latin versions of "Tumbeau du treschrestien roy Henry II" (leaves 24v-30, last group)
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Bookplate of Maurice Tezenas. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 636.
